ygData.subject: Re: Hey John!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve actually been waiting on getting the armor from you before i fought anymore hehe. I m camped outside of Neriak with Frizzan, and started character
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 1 Jun 1999, Zwanenburg, John wrote:

> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
> yeah i was really really sick the last week plus my pc was having problems
> but i got it all worked out now! So you finallygot yerself a Tommy eh? Good
> stuff, great weapon. So where abouts are you fighting now? You gonna be on
> IRC at all today?

I've actually been waiting on getting the armor from you before i fought
anymore hehe. I'm camped outside of Neriak with Frizzan, and started
character number 3. A dark elf wizzie named Veldrin. I gave him my old old
runed totem staff which i used with my druid before killing LJ to get the
Crooked Staff. That in combinaion with the Theourmatgist's Robe (dunno how
it's spelled) and i'm going pretty good. Those of you who have tried
wizards know how much you die :) I'm level 6, almost 7, in 16 hours.
Going good.

About IRC, nope.. There's too much to do in the office today for me to
even sneak on :( I will be on eq from 6pm to 10 or 10:30pm eastern
tonight for sure tho. Hopefully we can get together and roleplay some ;)

Talk to ya soon,

Nick
